name: Fortunefootprints.com
description: Fortunefootprints.com is a Recruiting Company which focuses on driving talent towards opportunity. It aims to help organization’s Hiring Function with innovative solution along with Leadership Hiring along with other HR Solutions. Fortune Footprints has an inbuilt hiring platform which helps recruiters to hire top talent effortlessly. For Candidates they keep getting irrelevant job alerts which involve filling long forms and get spammed by unwanted calls. Based on candidates professional background, career interests and skill competencies our portal helps bring a fine balance between the needs of recruiters and candidates. For Clients the first key to effective recruitment is being active online and establishing themselves as the authority in the respective field. 92 percent of recruiters use social media to find the best candidates for each position. Choosing the right social networks, Using Multiple Techniques to Keep Potential Candidates Engaged, is a cost-efficient and hardly targeted option for reaching the right audience. Our platform provides a Social Talent Community helps active and passive job seekers with companies looking to hire elite talent. Our in-built technology helps to integrate a diverse range of content into our Social Wall & maximize on audience engagement.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Fortune Favours The Prepared Mind
ShortDescription: Our platform delivers data-driven hiring experience based on trusted science and proven technology.
enhanced_description: Fortunefootprints.com is a recruiting company offering an in-built, data-driven hiring platform based on trusted science and proven technology. It focuses on connecting top talent with opportunities by balancing the needs of recruiters and candidates, leveraging professional background, career interests, and skill competencies. The platform helps organizations' hiring functions with innovative solutions, including leadership hiring. It utilizes an in-built social talent community and technology, potentially incorporating machine learning, to engage active and passive job seekers through a social wall designed to integrate diverse content and maximize audience engagement. Beyond recruitment, Fortunefootprints.com also provides broader HR solutions such as HR Transformation Projects, Compensation and Benefits Designing, and Training and Development.
